title: Jesus Disciple Profile Assessment
description: This assessment helps evaluate your spiritual growth and discipleship journey.

questions.text_en: I regularly spend time in prayer and Bible study
questions.text_zh: 我定期花时间祷告和学习圣经

questions.text_en: I trust God in difficult circumstances
questions.text_zh: 我在困难的环境中信靠神

questions.text_en: I show compassion and kindness to others
questions.text_zh: 我向他人展示同情心和善意

questions.text_en: I forgive those who have wronged me
questions.text_zh: 我原谅那些冤枉我的人

questions.text_en: I actively serve in my church community
questions.text_zh: 我积极服务于我的教会社区

questions.text_en: I look for opportunities to help others
I share my faith with non-believers
questions.text_zh: 我与非信徒分享我的信仰

questions.text_en: I live my life as an example of Christ's love
questions.text_zh: 我过着体现基督之爱的生活

questions.text_en: I seek to grow in my understanding of Scripture
questions.text_zh: 我寻求增长对圣经的理解

questions.text_en: I am open to correction and spiritual guidance
questions.text_zh: 我愿意接受纠正和属灵引导
